title: Forest-Inspired Berlin City Indulgence Opposite Tiergarten with Restaurant, Rooftop Bar & Jungle Sauna
description:
Perched atop Berlin’s iconic Bikini Haus, this design-forward hotel blends retro elegance with playful jungle motifs in West Berlin. Housed in a 1950s high-rise opposite Berlin Zoological Garden and Tiergarten, enjoy lush interiors with tropical greenery, neon-lit corridors and hammocks in the lobby.

On the rooftop, NENI brings vibrant Mediterranean‑Persian fare in a glasshouse setting, and the 10th-floor Monkey Bar spins cocktails across a wraparound terrace with jungle-lit views. Soak in the jungle sauna overlooking the zoo, borrow a city bike, then wander over to the Bikini Berlin Mall or the famous Kurfürstendamm for some retail therapy.
offer_address: Budapester Strasse 40, City West, Berlin 10787, Germany
